Luxe furs, earthy tones and nostalgic prints dominate Topshop's latest collection

Sadie Clayton - AW16 Show Report

Combining the traditional and the contemporary

Paul Costelloe - AW16 Show Report

Leather gloves, military coats and studs, 'power dressing' today's female warrior

Pam Hogg - AW16 Show Report

Rebellious, sassy and bold,Pam Hogg breaks all the laws of fashion

Georgia Hardinge - AW16 Show Report

With meteor showers and the transience of the cosmos, Hardinge creates a galaxy of fashion

Gareth Pugh - AW16 Show Report

Pugh's corporate bitches are man-eating machines

Fashion International - AW16 Show Report

Laser cut outs and thick knits bring a new twist to familiar silhouettes

Fashion DNA - AW16 Show Report

A trio of emerging designers celebrate cross-cultural tastes

Aspinal - AW16 Show Report

Vintage glamour and new prints converge in Aspinal's Presentation

Ashley Isham - AW16 Show Report

With ornate designs and splashes of colour, Isham makes waves on the runway

Alexander McQueen - AW16 Show Report

With glamour, intensity and sheer luxe, Mcqueen celebrates graceful femininity

Steven Tai: An old soul

Upcoming designer Steven Tai discusses his playful new collection with Grace Howarth
